content: It needs to be said that’s probably the scenario where Oregon beats UNC. And for all that’s been made about Hicks on Brooks favoring UNC, Hicks chasing Brooks across the court favors Oregon just as much. To beat UNC, Oregon has to continue to play their lite FM version of the Death Lineup, and in that scenario one of Brooks, Dorsey, Ennis or Pritchard is going to have some open looks to knock down.
